mapper.select: SELECT so.id,so.`product_code`,p.`product_name`,p.`model` AS product_model,p.`type` AS product_type, p.`product_unit`, so.`amount`,so.`type`,so.`create_time`,so.`update_time` FROM `storage_output` so LEFT JOIN `product_info` p ON p.`product_code` = so.`product_code` where 1=1 and so.`product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{productCode},'%') and so.`type` like CONCAT('%',#{type},'%') and so.`create_time` >= #{startTime} and so.`create_time` <= #{endTime}
